item.description:
25th Annual Pancake Breakfast - March 26, 2011

Wake up and head to Northwest Park this morning for the annual Friends of Northwest Park Pancake Breakfast from 8:00 AM to 11:00 AM in the Warming Shed.  Bring an appetite for a full breakfast of pancakes and sausage smothered in 100% pure maple syrup made right at Windsor’s very own Northwest Park.  Refreshment choices include orange juice, coffee, tea and hot chocolate.  $5.00 for adults and $3.00 for children under 6.  I will call and Let them know how many people will be comming.  Please call 285-1886 to register.
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in a clump near the line. This event gets busy. Lots of local people
item.why: Its fun and we have been doing it for 3 years!!!!!

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: 25 Annual Pancake Breakfast.
